tool_description: An API providing random Polish word of chosen type (noun, verb, adjective or other) with specified length (3 to over 30 letters)
name: Polish Words
title: Polish Words

api_list.name: Get random noun with length
api_list.description: Gets randomly selected noun for provided length. Length can be from range 3-30+ (longest Polish words have 32, 33 letters)

api_list.name: Get random verb with length
api_list.description: Gets randomly selected verb for provided length. Length can be from range 3-30+ (longest Polish words have 32, 33 letters)

api_list.name: Validate WORD existence_copy
api_list.description: Validates if provided polish word in general (no category chosen) exists in dictionary

api_list.name: Get random WORD with length
api_list.description: Gets randomly selected word in general (no category chosen) for provided length. Length can be from range 3-30+ (longest Polish words have 32, 33 letters)

api_list.name: Validate word from other than noun, verb, adjective categories existence
api_list.description: Validates if provided polish word from other than noun, verb, adjective categories exists in dictionary

api_list.name: Validate adjective existence
api_list.description: Validates if provided polish adjective exists in dictionary

api_list.name: Validate noun existence
api_list.description: Validates if provided polish noun exists in dictionary

api_list.name: Validate verb existence
api_list.description: Validates if provided polish verb exists in dictionary

api_list.name: Get random word from other than noun, verb, adjective categories with length
api_list.description: Gets randomly selected word from other than noun, verb, adjective categories for provided length. Length can be from range 3-30+ (longest Polish words have 32, 33 letters)

api_list.name: Get random adjective with length
api_list.description: Gets randomly selected adjective for provided length. Length can be from range 3-30+ (longest Polish words have 32, 33 letters)
